English.Text: "A harmless experiment!" says the doctor quickly, whipping some ricin seeds from a coat pocket. "Normally it would be castor oil used to purge their bowels but I wonder if the seeds wouldn't do the same." Unfortunately, the doctor's seeds are extremely poisonous. In a few hours the patients are all dead. Devastated and fewer in number, the survivors take forever to complete the repairs. Exhausted, they drift to a safe harbour to try to recover.
